ARTICLE.TITLE: Amanda Holden's glorious summer from UK staycation to break in Italy and visit to France
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Get all the very latest news in Ireland straight to your email every single day Sign up! Thank you for subscribing See our privacy notice Invalid Email

Amanda Holden has been living her best live during her summer break from work.

The 49-year-old - who hosts a radio show on Heart FM - has been enjoying her time off by being with her husband Chris Hughes and their children Lexi, 14, and Hollie, eight and they've been visiting a number of enviable locations.

Britain's Got Talent judge Amanda started off her holiday with a staycation on the Isles of Scilly.

The age-defying star ensured she flaunted the break on social media by littering her Instagram page with a number of stunning beach snaps that showed her wowing in various skimpy bikinis.

Amanda also posted snaps of herself posing in front of a rugged coast front with sailing boats in the background as she lent on a wooden post.

Proving that she likes a treat on holiday, she also revealed that she munched on some fish and chips with her family for dinner on night.

(Image: noholdenback/Instagram)

(Image: COPYRIGHT UNKNOWN)

After visiting the UK beach location the TV face flew to the South Of France where she and her brood met up with some celeb pals - including Piers Morgan.

The British ITV favourites enjoyed a boozy lunch at the upmarket Club 55 in Saint Tropez in France, alongside Formula 1 racing sensation David Coulthard as well as all their families and filmed it all for their fans to see.

(Image: noholdenback/Instagram)

(Image: noholdenback/Instagram)

The wealthy gang dined on lobster and knocked back bottles of wine as they let loose at the beach club venue.

And now the blonde beauty has hit Italy and shared a number of pretty photos were she posed alongside her mini-me daughters.

In one the trio sat on stone steps as they showcased their bronze glows as they modelled cute dresses.

Another offering showed Amanda standing with a large glass of orange Aperol spritz and she could be seen gazing lovingly at the fizzy cocktail as she stunned in a cornflower blue dress.

Do you have a story to sell? Get in touch with us at webcelebs@trinitymirror.com or call us direct 0207 29 33033

METADATA.description: Amanda Holden has been jumping between different sunny locations during her summer break from work
METADATA.author: Sara-Aisha Kent

og.title: Inside Amanda Holden's glorious summer as star visits multiple destinations
